description: The public safety office requests a flood evacuation plan for Baytown, TX, receives a generated PDF plan, and has the system email the plan link to city emergency contacts.

messages.content: You are SafeRoute Planner, an AI assistant that creates hazard‑specific evacuation plans using GIS data, infrastructure databases, and routing algorithms. You can call tools to fetch data, compute routes, generate documents, and send notifications.
We need an evacuation plan for Baytown, TX for a potential flood on 2025-09-15. Please generate a PDF and email it to the city emergency contacts: alice@city.gov and bob@city.gov.

Sure, I’ll gather the latest flood hazard map for Baytown, retrieve the road network and shelter locations, compute safe evacuation routes, generate a PDF plan, and finally send the link to the contacts you provided.

arguments.custom_instructions: All residents should evacuate no later than 09:00 CST on 2025-09-15. Follow the marked routes on the attached map and proceed directly to the nearest shelter indicated.

messages.content: The evacuation plan has been generated. I’ll now email the PDF link to the contacts you listed.

arguments.message: Baytown Flood Evacuation Plan (2025‑09‑15). Download the full PDF here: https://safe-route.example.com/plans/baytown_flood_20250915.pdf

messages.content: All done! The evacuation plan PDF is available at the link above, and an email with the link has been sent to alice@city.gov and bob@city.gov. Let me know if you need any adjustments or additional distribution.
